Text.Page: Elleon gave you vital intelligence: a way to enter the Ebon Tower, Thulsa's Stronghold. But Elleon's way required a special key: a gem belonging to Killian, the god of terror. Elleon and Jelena accompanied you to the Labyrinth of Terror, Killian's home. Elleon intercepted a blast of magic meant for you—perhaps at the cost of his life....

Dear —it looks like we'll be fighting side by side once again. Thulsa and Killian awakened Kelsaik, but you kept them from obtaining complete control.

Kelsaik must be near Thulsa...which is worrisome, but it gives us an opportunity. Jelena and I know where Thulsa is: Vale of Spires, Lorcada.

Let's talk in person. I'll see you at the blacksmith's workshop.

Sincerely, Elleon

Long time no see, .

Thulsa, Killian, and now Kelsaik. We have a knack for attracting powerful enemies, don't we?

Ever heard of an ancient stronghold called the Ebon Tower?

Well, Thulsa is there...maybe Kelsaik, too. But Thulsa has given a key to only one visitor. Guess who?"Killian?"

Exactly! We need the gem on Killian's staff, or we can't get into the Ebon Tower. And it's not gonna break my heart to take the gem off Killian's cooling corpse.

So Killian first, then. He's in the Labyrinth of Terror.

But before we go, talk to Jelena. She's cooked up something special for our destination.

Wow, , I see some new gear on you—and a few new scars. Nice—they suit you.

Take this. It's a potion of will. Engineer Gaicus and I whipped it up, and he's got a supply if you run low later.

The Labyrinth of Terror isn't just a scary name. Enter without the potion, and your brain will flee out your ears!

Anyway, on to the labyrinth. Ten gold says Elleon's already there.
We just broke the seal, and Jelena went in first. Let's go!

I can't let Elleon die. I just can't!

I know Elleon would want me to leave him and go with you, but he's in no position to argue. I feel horrible, though..."It's okay. I got this."
I know you do, <PCNAME>. I'll be back in Habere, and I want all the details. So go kill a god already!
You have extracted the gem that will get you in to the Ebon Tower.

If you're alive, then...yes! Yes! Yes!

Elleon? Alive, but hanging by a thread. Still, he's Elleon, right? That oughta count for something.

Elleon and I are out of commission for the time being, though. Give our "best" to Kelsaik, will ya?
